name: Bea
description:
Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys
Interact - Alt / Z / J

Bea is an original life simulation/minimalist RPG currently in development for the Game Boy. The game features themes of mental health, living with internal struggles, and emphasizing the importance of personal life over work life.

This is an EARLY ALPHA DEMO - the game is far from complete! I have a laundry list of features I look forward to adding. Please look forward to many future updates!
